attributes.action: Help to house family with two special needs children facing homelessness crisis
attributes.additional_details:
I ask the question if Heather Frosts needs are special - why aren't those of my special needs children?
I have 3 children - 2 that have mental health and special needs and have worked for the past 10 years or so.I am Faced with unemployment and homelessness in the near future due to landlord/boss selling and  the council is unable to provide adequate housing and reassurance of housing, suggesting a travel lodge indefinitely or a property outside of Tewkesbury which greatly increased the risks to my children's  safety, well being and education due to complications of their conditions.
Please sign this and help those families that need extra support.
